website_summaries.verdict: This compact starter tent offers good access to your plants.
pros: Mylar interior returns more than 92% of grow light back to plants and herbs
Heavy-duty zippers and double-stitched seams keep light from leaking
Reinforced with metal poles for stability
Good for starting seeds and cultivating exotic fruits, herbs, vegetables, or seasonal fruits year-round

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: It's not fun when you finish assembling and its 4 inches to short, come on guys
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a really nice space and in spite of its low price
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this tent for the price and for not having giant logos. It's a really nice space and in spite of its low price, very high quality. I haven't had any issues with the zippers or windows. There are a few spots with pinprick light bleed, but nothing I cant live with.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wazowski

customer_reviews.title: Found it to be a great tent, plenty of pockets for routing wiring and ...
customer_reviews.text: Found it to be a great tent, plenty of pockets for routing wiring and ventilation system but were it not for the zippers I would have given it a 5 star. The front door opening, bottom right corner is approximately 6 inches short of closing before breaking at the seam, probably try using velcro to fill the gap.temporarily?
customer_reviews.author: D. Engelson

customer_reviews.title: High quality and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: I will update the review if I have any problems but so far it’s been great. Really easy to assemble, great construction, metal framework, and heavy duty zippers. DO HEED THE WARNINGS ABOUT BEING CAREFUL WHILE STRETCHING THE FABRIC OVER THE FRAME!!
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Light leaks, useless floor mat, cheap zipper
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Ipower filtration system so when it was time to upgrade my tent I thought I would give Ipower tent a try and I was kinda disappointed compared to my other tent. The floor tray is more like a mat it doesn’t go up the wall making it pointless. Tons of light leak almost every seem plus spots randomly in the material. I tried the glue trick and it helped a little but the zipper lets out a ton of light which I can’t glue obviously. If you are just using it for tomatoes it will be fine but other than that I would look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Beagle

customer_reviews.title: Parts might be damaged...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Just started putting it together and noticed one of the Rods has a broken pin and the of the corner pieces is warped. will update once i have it fully put together. Edit: finally have it put together other than the initial issues this is a pretty solid tent. You will need atleast one other person to put it together, but it fits tight without being too tight. Just expect the possibility of a fitting needing some minor readjustment
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Tent doesnt fit poles provided
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for starting seedlings in tue winter and it seemed nice but I didn't try to use it until Febuary so it is outsode the time to send it back . That is my fault but the issue here is, the actual tent is only 4 feet tall, not nearly tall enough to go around the poles provided. It is of decent quality but its useless if the Tent only goes partway up the poles. Manufacturing issues with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tittysprinkles!

customer_reviews.title: Light leak in thread!!
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap tent option. Lots of vents and extremely sturdy. Zippers don't leak but the threading around the zipper leaks and there's random pin pricks that leak in the walls. Size is true 5x5x78. Going to try some flex seal or something to cover up these holes. Packaging was neat and parts were organized. The plastic clips that hold the rods during shipping were smashed and one of the plastic pieces on the corners came broken as well but everything was there and nothing was bent.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: My particular tent must have been a return item. It had torn mylar, missing pieces, bent pole and the dimensions were off. It’s almost a foot bigger than advertised which caused it to not fit right. And the tent itself is so extremely tight it would not stretch entirely over the frame. Spent 3 hours wrestling around with it only to be completely ripped off. Terrible purchase and a huge pain to return something so huge
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Junk Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these at 2 different times first one give 5 stars 2nd one junk looks like was made by baby with no instructions on how to make. zippers won't zip stitching very bad can not use as a grow tent a waste of money and time need a couple more tents will not be wasting my money on this brand again I will get some where else very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a disabled friend who needs to do some herb gardening. The unit was a bit of a pain to put together, but that is likely true for all of them, but I'm very pleased with the quality of the material and zippers. Looks like it should last for several years. Plenty of places for vents, and each vent hole has a double method of cinching, so it is very possible to make air tight. Exceptional value.
customer_reviews.author: Pharmboy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this tent, it's by far one of the best purchases I've ever made on Amazon. The price is great and the quality is top notch... the frame is all metal, no cheap plastic corner pieces like some tents have. The quality of the tent itself is actually impressive for the price point and there are only a couple pin sized holes along the stitching where light leaks.. not a problem though. The zippers are high quality and easy to use and it was pretty easy setting it up. Overall I'm very happy with this tent, it did not dissappoint at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, more tent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for your dollar. Thoughtfully designed tent with features that make your life easier. Like zip open three sides for easy assembly and complete access when needed. Each exhaust sleeve is doubled , one sleeve inside the other, each with its own cinch, for better light blocking. A convenient snap is available to hold the large flap out of the way when two sides are open. There are two smaller openings to reach or step in from the sides for easy access. Overall, fit and finish of manufacture are very good, functionality of a more expensive tent. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Truslow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and this size is perfect. With the access on each side, it is easy to care for plants. It has a viewing window for monitoring while the lights are on. I use welding goggles to protect my eyes when the lights are on.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Good zippers, high quality tent
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most of reviews,I decided to put this tent to the test BEFORE I wrote my review. This tent has held up great. No issues with crappy zippers like most common tents on the market. Set up was a breeze, all parts were in box. Highly recommended. 5 star worth every penny. (60x60x80)
customer_reviews.author: Tattoodlineman

customer_reviews.title: i love it.
customer_reviews.text: i love it..took some time to assemble..hard to tell what end is up etc...but just look for the ipower label (very small )that is the top corner ....go from there...took me a few hours to assemble....but it was a very small area..ended up taking it to another area and assembled it to figure out what was where...then took to place and re-assembled it ....still very well constructed and nice heavy duty zippers and vents etc.....nice for the cost!!!!
customer_reviews.author: scott d.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I found this quite easy to assemble and very light tight. A previous review had stated it was hard to assemble and took three people all day. I set aside a day to construct it, but ended up putting it together in 1.25 hours in a space only a few feet larger than it's base dimensions. I am quite happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Glenn E. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Incredible for the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it for two years. Incredibly well-made for the money. Does leak a bit of light around the zippers and some of the stitching. But nothing a little duct tape won’t fix. You couldn’t beat this tent for $250 let alone paying only $90. I believe this year I’m going to get another!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J Connell

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've got 2 grows out of it so far but pinholes are starting to appear all over the fabric and along the seams. Good for the price but not meant to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bovid

customer_reviews.title: great tent
customer_reviews.text: awesome tent. sturdy frame and thick rigid fabric. no light gets in during night time light cycles. more than enough ports for 4" and 6" ducts going up+out in all directions. setup in 20 minutes, had all my fans and lights hung and running in about 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Snowden

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty sturdy. Small light leak through the zipper but I don't think it'll be a problem. Easy to set up and I didn't have a lot of room to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to set up, sturdy, don't see any light coming through. Looked at a lot of different options, very happy with the quality for the price. The zipper is a little hard to use, but if we're patient with it, it works. Had it up for a couple weeks and our tomatoes, lettuce and spinach are growing great. It's so nice to have fresh veggies in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Tandem

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with the ceiling support poles (lack of) or with customer service. The ceiling support has only 2 poles. I emailed support and have not gotten any sort of reply. I called them today and was told they do not sell any support poles separately. They will only replace them if there is an issue and they deem they should be replaced. The tent itself seems well made and that itself, I am satisfied with. Just wish they would sell another set of ceiling poles if a customer requests an extra set is all.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Big tent!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with this tent. It was very easy to assemble, and it is much larger than I thought! 48 inches is pretty big, but it feels much larger. One star lost for vague or inaccurate parts list. Thrre is no carrying case, and I may have been shorted one of the shallow ceiling bars (the parts list had two bars, my kit came with one.)
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, had an issue with an order. They fixed it completely! I'm totally satisfied with the service and the product. Definitely reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazash

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Great for the buck! Already on my 4th harvest and no problems with the tent. Love how spacious it it's and how sturdy it feels.
customer_reviews.author: Pessoa

customer_reviews.title: The metal frame is not the greatest, but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I received this in a large rectangular box. The quality is outstanding. I was not prepared for how well this thing is made. The material of the tent itself is very durable, and similar to the heavy duty tents we use in the military. The metal frame is not the greatest, but gets the job done. You can always build a sturdier frame with pvc if you ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh K

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality was better than previous tents I’ve owned in the past. Walls are thick. Metal supports could be stronger but I’ve had zero issues and it is sturdy. Just my preference. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jbrown6064

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: grow house is top quality......seems are sewn with precision......zippers are top quality.....perfect size...
customer_reviews.author: joseph arsenault

customer_reviews.title: Love the way you can unzipp the top and bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: I still cant believe the price. It is really made well. I do wish it had a window. Love the way you can unzipp the top and bottom 75 % of the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together (put it together myself) seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast, quality materials, easy to put together (put it together myself) seems to be light tight (I haven't noticed any light leaks). It's accessible from 3 sides. My only complaints would be I thought it would come with the green colored window (it was clear) and the zippers stick constantly, small price to pay to keep the light out I guess. Overall I'm satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Hershel Reed

customer_reviews.title: Hoya Mecca!
customer_reviews.text: My best purchase in years. Very roomy and sturdy for such a good price. My Hoyas are finally thriving.
customer_reviews.author: ASW

customer_reviews.title: I love this tent...its sturdy and its perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent...its surdy and its perfect...thank u ipower...i will buy another one soon 😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Kingdavid3277

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! Don't forget to read instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! First time assembling it didn't look at instruction (My bad) Second time read instructions went up fast!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Glasser

customer_reviews.title: Its gonna come broken.
customer_reviews.text: Useless piece of crap sitting taking up precious space the rods that put it together are bent to hell as if I have time to pack this garbage back up sent it back I need stuff that I dont buy brand new just to fix
customer_reviews.author: drFIRE.beantowngreentown

customer_reviews.title: Setup was super simple and straightforward
customer_reviews.text: Setup was super simple and straightforward. A single person could do it, but I would recommend having someone there to assist. Materials are all super high quality with little conveniences like a little net to hold a clipboard or your shears and hooks to secure the door to when you open it so it's not just flapping around.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality inexpensive tent
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent for your flowering girls! Absolutely love it! Two people are required for assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksey

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Just set up but I can say the build quality and canvas is top notch. Far exceeded expectations. Attention to detail is great. Heavy duty zippers are a definite plus. Many many vent ports, each with double sinch closures. Don't hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Spend $30 more and get higher quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine all set up. Mine has a minor zipper problem. Waterproof floor is flimsy, but effective. Watch window is kind of small and wavy and hard to focus through. Tool bag location is in the back corner farthest from walk-in openings, not the smartest spot.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality tent would buy again 🤙🏼
customer_reviews.text: Just received my tent, only thing is I’m missing 1 strap and 1 roof bar shallow also no carry case inside, hope they will send the replacement parts soon, other than that very nice !
customer_reviews.author: Milton C.

customer_reviews.title: Tent is very good for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This tent is good quality for the price. It came fast and had no packaging issues. Going for the 10x10 next.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good grow tent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fast service. My product had few small holes. I just taped over them.
customer_reviews.author: Panman

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is cheap
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. My issue is the zipper. I have only had this for a few months and the zipper is broken. It’s very cheap and they should put a stronger zipper in. I’m very easy on my things too so it’s not like I was being overly hard on opening and closing this thing. I wouldn’t repurchase this.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I have notice some pin holes in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have notice some pin holes in the fabric after 1 season but I imagine most of them get that way with the UV rays beating down on them. would recommend to a beginner grower
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good product and price
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. Doesn't look sturdy but it is. Two inline fans two lights hood air filter hanging from the roof without a problem
customer_reviews.author: Fish

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with straps no instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked to gave this a higher rating there were just a couple things like not getting the straps it said came with it that was really disappointing and no instruction manual other than that seems like a great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Joey Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Zipper issues around the door
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be used as a darkroom. It is fantastic. The one problem that I’ve had is with the zipper for the door. The zipper sticks often and in multiple places. I’m going to try a little beeswax on it and see if that won’t make it less of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Livalittle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Should have 2 people to assemble. Only had less than a month and the seams are already tearing. Also see hundreds of pinholes all over it when there is a light on the inside and you turn the lights off on the outside. I do like the size.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Krasnesky

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed at the quality of this grow tent
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the quality of this grow tent. It was very easy to set up. All the hardware you need comes with it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Steveo

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Holding up really well. Not sure why people have problems with the zippers they are stout.
customer_reviews.author: RyanT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Vents/ovservation window are solid construction. Double gusset 6" and 4" holes. Dope as crap.
customer_reviews.author: Ben currier

customer_reviews.title: If you can afford higher quality do it
customer_reviews.text: Poles are poorly welded together and bend where connected, and the main zipper to open and close tent broke in under a year.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Pin holes everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd tent from you, but just lite up for my grow and pin hole rolls all along the seams and windows. We always use black nail polish, but this is junk.
customer_reviews.author: R.N.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this produce
customer_reviews.text: I have had this up and running for a week now and no light leakage anywhere. Zipper works easily all the way around and no light leakage here either. I would recommend this produce if all are like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent! Plenty of space. Easy access into it and plenty of exhaust and power cord options.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Verry sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty thick keeps light out works as good as it says
customer_reviews.author: thomas cook

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent zipper is really nice on my third grow no complaints
customer_reviews.author: braden

customer_reviews.title: Hospital sterile
customer_reviews.text: If you want to get your bang for your buck grow in a enclosed area tents work best
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Couple months into it still working perfect. I bOught another one . Easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Luis Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: This tent has been great so far
customer_reviews.text: This tent has been great so far. We've only had though a couple of weeks. 4 Stars because the directions weren't that great and when pulling the tent over top of the frame we split a seem because the fit is so tight. So be careful. It is good that it is a tight fit but it's hard to make it fit without splitting a seem.
customer_reviews.author: PATRCIA DA BOY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty tent! Really impressed with its quality! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: TJump

customer_reviews.title: Bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best bang for buck, no need to spend $300+ for a 5x5. Had a few small light leaks but iPower quickly sent me a replacement tent for no charge, great customer service 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great tent quality zippers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 39 x 39 right before christmas. This is a great tent quality zippers and was rather easy to put together. Im now just ordered a second one 49 x 49 cheers
customer_reviews.author: Danny Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Budget tent
customer_reviews.text: there was pretty good amount of pinholes in mine. It was to be expected it's a cheap budget tent I had to fix with reflective tape if your not against having to do some extra work to seal it completely then it's a good buy to save some money
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Durable, spacious, well designed. This company stand by their products and has friendly customer service. Will continue to support iPower!
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: much better quality than others I have purchased in the past
customer_reviews.text: First iPower brand tent I have purchased, much better quality than others I have purchased in the past. only bad thing for me is there is no viewing window.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Tent collapsed after two days of use with only x2 twenty lb. Lights.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this tent. Quality is superb, zippers are heavy duty and lite proof. Very sturdy frame. Highly recommend for a small home garden
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hall

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Mold
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived, and when opened I discovered mold growing everywhere. I grow medicine and need a sterile environment, this tent is now useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Iwasaki

customer_reviews.title: No light gets through so far a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Tent was packed well.It is a heavy duty material,I was able to set it up by myself in about 20 min. No light gets through so far a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: David Trouten

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: I like this tent, has been using it for a year gotta give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: L. T. Situmeang

customer_reviews.title: This tent is perfect a few pin holes in and around the seam ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent is perfect a few pin holes in and around the seam but that is to be expected. Excellent quality and strong enough to hold a cool tube light and fan along with filter. Will be purchasing another one very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this grow tent but one of the zippers broke
customer_reviews.text: I like this grow tent but one of the zippers broke. I was worried that might happen because the zippers look cheap and have lots of curves and weight to support.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: NOT 78".... more like 79.5"
customer_reviews.text: It's all great EXCEPT that it measures just over 79" and NOT the 78" that is listed.... meaning it doesn't fit. Extremely frustrated as I specifically picked this one based on it being 78".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light Leaks :(
customer_reviews.text: So far so good... Material looks good ill give a 1-10 (8) For first timers is fine But someone that already knows about this Look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: OGrow

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE, Poles are thin and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: What I received were just a box of poles that were marked and stamped ( refurbished) These poles were thin enough to bend by hand. No covering!
customer_reviews.author: ThatGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the easiest tent I've ever assembled. Easy to set up, vents are perfect for 6" ducting. Quality is better than expected for the price of the tent. This will work perfect for what I'm using it for.
customer_reviews.author: John March

customer_reviews.title: Great budget tent
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the money hard to find one better for price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MOLD EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: It was even missing a pole lol definitely not worth it. The price was $107 I'm assuming they'll offer to send a new one, but who knows.But I don't trust it.
customer_reviews.author: TK T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it is great, the only thing I would like improved is the sturdiness of the bars but other than that fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: N0tShawn

customer_reviews.title: This item has multiple holes
customer_reviews.text: This item has multiple holes in the walls this allowing Light to penetrate through it is not a light proof or sealed proof tent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk dont buy cheap
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks dont buy cheap built collapsed and broke apart dont buy I want my money back it destroyed my medicine
customer_reviews.author: Richard glock

customer_reviews.title: I power tent review
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was was right on time nice tent for cost. Could use larger tubing its 99 % light proof little lite leak on sume stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Grow tent review
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty stout, after you got the base built, figure out what side the bottom of the tent is it’s a cake walk, Good Job 👍
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The production was easy to assemble and all the poles were marked the only dislike I have is some light leaks but not enough not to care about
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Michael almasy

customer_reviews.title: Yes it's wonderful, now the hudmity goes down to 40-45 which ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's wonderful , now the hudmity goes down to 40-45 which is great compared to 65-70 in open room not to mention better reflection and no funky smells drifting all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Too small of a tent to go arond the poles
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I tried to put this grow tent together and it was too small to fit around the poles and it had a tear in the corner on the bottom. We are currently in the process of returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tents! I purchased two of them
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tents! I purchased two of them, not at the same time, which shows how much I like them. Very easy to set up. A little bit wobbly in my opinion. I wish there was a viewing window. Not having a window and being a little wobbly are my only complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Footprints
customer_reviews.text: I had a footprint on the inside of my tent smh and the zippers got threads hanging ... The tent cloth super wrinkled .. Looked used... Did i buy used tent?
customer_reviews.author: Carl walker

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, doesnt leak light very much. Overall for the price was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Mold/mildew
customer_reviews.text: Pull the tent out and as I'm unfolding it. I see white fuzzy mold on every seam and every side.
customer_reviews.author: Von Grandchamp

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great it can handle 2 lights could use a little more support on top but works great for he price it blocks the light no leaks zippers tough the zipper pull handles are weak I just made my own loops to pull them open and closed has great ventilation if needed plenty of exhaust and also exactly the measurements that were stated! I own any power items and I'm sticking with them they're top quality as far as I'm concerned!
customer_reviews.author: shaun courville

customer_reviews.title: Enclosure fabric holes
customer_reviews.text: Multiple light spots- zipper and received with numerous small holes. Fits so tight on frame it can be ripped if not very cautious.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great zippers and material. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty big and the Material is very good. For the price I’m very happy! I don’t think the support up top, will hold what it’s rated for. But that’s just my outview. It’s very air tight and keeps it super hot in the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: No light leaks and zippers work nice. Overall great grow tent. I can’t wait to setup another
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are terrible and it's very hard to assemble tent material on ...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are terrible and it's very hard to assemble tent material on frame. Definitely need two people to get material on right.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Louise Watson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent. I paid under $130 at time of ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tent. I paid under $130 at time of purchase. Great quality and easy to set up. Lots of accessibility, especially if you SCROG. Just make sure you check that the contents are complete. It's big, so have plenty of space. The quickest way to get it started for set up, is look for the bottom, where the Velcro vents flaps are, and square that out. From the bottom, set up the frame inside and work your way up. There's a soda bottle in the corner of the attached picture for size reference. To utilze the space better and have even coverage, I used 2 600w lights, rather than 1 1200w light. Happy growing.
customer_reviews.author: Tru Collector

customer_reviews.title: Check the contents ASAP on arrival!
customer_reviews.text: The tent material is good quality and the framework is adequate. The issue is that the package was missing three corner pieces and unfortunately, because I didn't need the grow tent until this weekend I didn't unpack and check the contents. Sure enough, when I laid everything out I was missing the three corner pieces. Sadly though, My return window had expired three days ago, so now I am stuff with a incomplete tent put together with bits of lumber and duct tape. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Babbo

customer_reviews.title: Wish i got all my pieces
customer_reviews.text: My order was missing a piece. In order to get it fixed I would have to return and get a whole new product. Buy any other tent if you like getting all your pieces in the shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Quiara Breckenridge

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great tent! Easy to assemble. Better quality than i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L.

feature_bullets: SAVE ENERGY: Tear-proof, over 95% reflective, 99% sealed light proof mylar with double stitching, and heavy duty zippers
STURDY & RELIABLE: Heavy duty metal poles rated to handle at least 110 lbs, come with reliable metal corners

EASY OBSERVATION & ORGANIZATION: Easy view window sealed with transparent plastic and removable cover to get your plant observed without step into your tent. Convenient tool bag on hand for most accessory tools

KEEP PLANT AREA CLEAN & COOL: Removable water-resistant mylar floor tray with security straps to secure spill tray to frame. Remove heat from your plant with double layer ventilation ducting holes and bottom ventilation windows with removable cover
HASSLE-FREE: Tool free installation. 1 year manufacturer warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars277 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
